name: sips
title: Image Modification
description: Apply filters and transformations to various image formats, and convert between them.
author: HelloImSteven

preferences.title: Image Input
preferences.name: inputMethod
preferences.description: Where to obtain the image to modify.

preferences.title: Image Output
preferences.name: imageResultHandling
preferences.description: How to handle the result of the image modification, i.e. where to save the modified image, or whether to copy it to the clipboard.

commands.name: rotate
commands.title: Rotate Images
commands.description: Rotate the selected images by the specified amount of degrees

preferences.name: rotationUnit
preferences.title: Rotation Unit
preferences.description: The unit of the angle to rotate selected images by

commands.name: convert
commands.title: Convert Images
commands.description: Convert the selected images to the specified format

preferences.label: Generate Image Previews
preferences.name: generatePreviews
preferences.description: Whether to generate previews of images upon every use of the command. If disable, the command will run faster, but you'll only see static previews that won't match the color of the generated image.
